text: Napat Injaiuea (), nicknamed Gun, is a Thai singer-songwriter, actor, writer and the winner of the 6th season of reality talent show The Star 6. ==Early life and education== Injaiuea was born Chanin Injaiuea (ชนินทร์ อินทร์ใจเอื้อ) on 23 October 1990 in Suphan Buri Province, Thailand as the middle child. He attended the Suankularb Wittayalai School, and graduated with a bachelor's degree from Kasetsart University. ==Career== Injaiuea debuted after winning a Thai singing competition, The Star 6, whereupon he adopted the stage name "Naphat" (นภัทร). His entertainment career spans music, acting, and hosting. ==External links== * Napat Injaiuea Napat Injaiuea Napat Injaiuea Napat Injaiuea Category:1990 births Category:Living people
title: Napat Injaiuea
